alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 28 at 7:34PM CST until November 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 MSG unknown 3.7 3.6 3.6 &&
